com.dabaeen.XbeeIOIO

Class XbeeConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dabaeen.XbeeIOIO.XbeeConfiguration

  • public class XbeeConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    XbeeConfiguration class is the builder for an Xbee configuration. Passed as the parameter for Xbee.configure(XbeeConfiguration, Xbee.OnDataReceivedListener). Each method concats AT commands to build a string batch command. If multiple get commands were sent, one response will only be received which would probably be the response for the first command.

      • setNodeIdentifier

        public XbeeConfiguration setNodeIdentifier(java.lang.String nodeIdentifier)
        Sets the node identifier (NI) of the Xbee module. The node identifier appears in the node description when getNodeDiscovery() is called.
        Parameters:
        nodeIdentifier - ASCII string of a maximum of 20 characters, it will be substringed otherwise.
        Returns:
        The XbeeConfiguration instance.

      • setCoordinatorEnable

        public XbeeConfiguration setCoordinatorEnable(boolean enable)
        Sets the Xbee device as a coordinator or end-device.
        Default Parameter Value: Disable
        Parameters:
        enable - True to enable coordinator mode.
        Returns:
        The XbeeConfiguration instance.

      • writeToNonVolatileMemory

        public XbeeConfiguration writeToNonVolatileMemory()
        Writes the current configuration the non-volatile memory. Parameter values remain in the module's memory until overwritten by subsequent use of this command.

        This must be the last method to call before configuring.
        Returns:
        The XbeeConfiguration instance.

      • getFirmwareVersion

        public XbeeConfiguration getFirmwareVersion()
        Gets the firmware version of the Xbee module.
        Returns:
        The XbeeConfiguration instance.

      • getNodeIdentifier

        public XbeeConfiguration getNodeIdentifier()
        Prompts the Xbee to get its node identifier. The node identifier is the return value of Xbee.configure(XbeeConfiguration, Xbee.OnDataReceivedListener) for this command.
        Returns:
        The XbeeConfiguration instance.

      • getNodeDiscovery

        public XbeeConfiguration getNodeDiscovery()
        Prompts the Xbee to discover the nodes. Use parseNodeDiscovery(String) on Xbee.configure(XbeeConfiguration, Xbee.OnDataReceivedListener)'s return value of this command.
        Returns:
        The XbeeConfiguration instance.

      • getCoordinatorEnable

        public XbeeConfiguration getCoordinatorEnable()
        Prompts the Xbee to read the coordinator enable command.
        Returns:
        The XbeeConfiguration instance.

        Writes any command.

      • parseNodeDiscovery

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Node> parseNodeDiscovery(java.lang.String xbeeReply)
        Parses the returned value from Xbee.configure(XbeeConfiguration, com.dabaeen.XbeeIOIO.Xbee.OnDataReceivedListener) which called getNodeDiscovery().
        Parameters:
        xbeeReply - The returned value from Xbee#configure(XbeeConfiguration, com.dabaeen.XbeeIOIO.Xbee.OnDataReceivedListener)).
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of nodes discovered.
